evidence.text:
FIONA: You have an eyelash. Let me get it. She touches his eye. He grabs her hand and holds it in place. They stare at each other. Edward leans in to kiss her.
FIONA: I...I have to go.
EDWARD: I’m sorry, I--
FIONA: No, no. I didn’t realize what time it was.

FIONA: But I’m only trying -
EDWARD: I know, always so helpful, aren’t you? I don’t want your pity. I know that I disgust you.
FIONA: That isn’t true!
